Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Sup.EXPLANATION: A score reflecting the overall quality of products supplied by vendors.
The percentage of deliveries made on or before the scheduled delivery date.
The time from order placement to delivery from the supplier.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Sup.FORMULA: Total Supplier Lead Time / Number of Orders

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Sup.EXPLANATION: A score evaluating the risks associated with suppliers based on various factors.
The total cost incurred due to defects, rework, and other quality issues.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Sup.FORMULA: (Cost of Internal Failures + Cost of External Failures + Cost of Appraisal + Cost of Prevention) / Total Revenue * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Sup.EXPLANATION: A rating based on the overall performance of suppliers against set criteria.
The percentage of suppliers meeting contractual and regulatory requirements.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Sup.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant Supplier Actions / Total Supplier Actions) * 100

Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Sup.EXPLANATION: A measure of the overall relationship quality between the company and its suppliers.
Supply Chain+Supply Chain Management+Sup.FORMULA: Average Score from Supplier Relationship Surveys
